channel.title: [FM] Shortnight Signups (6/6)
channel.description:
# [Shortnight](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Shortnight)
### hosted by @katze and @katze, cohost @Chloe, who is also just katze
###### Reviewed by @Geyde who is just @katze from the past
# Rules
Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
**A minimum of 20 game-relevant posts must be posted every day. Failure to meet the requirement will result in a forced replacement. However, hosts reserve the right to replace without a warning should we believe that a potential extended period of lowposting will result in a significant drop of game quality.**
# Mechanics
The six players will be arranged into two groups, Group A and Group B. Both groups will have two members of the [color=green]**Town**[/color], and one member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. The groups will be announced at the start of the game.
On Day 1, both groups must vote out a player in their group.
- If both groups vote out their [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] member, [color=green]**Town**[/color] wins. - If one group votes out a member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color], while the other group votes out a member of the [color=green]**Town**[/color], The game will go into Night. The voted out [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] will be given 24 hours to vengefully kill one player in *their* group, and the game will continue to D2. The two [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] can talk freely during these 24 hours. - If both groups vote out a member of the [color=green]**Town**[/color], the two voted out members will be given 24 hours to unanimously decide on somebody to shoot. This will be done in a private chat, during the Night phase. - If they shoot a third member of the [color=green]**Town**[/color], [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] wins. - If they shoot a member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color], then the game will continue to D2. - If the two players cannot unanimously decide on a target, the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] will be given both players' choices. They will be given an additional hour (this will extend Night phase) to choose a player to kill from those choices.
If Day 2 occurs, it will play out like a regular 3 player LyLo situation. **Votes will be locked on Day 2, but not prior.**
**Days will be 24 hours long. If, pregame, a majority of the players wish to extend it to 48, it will be extended.**
# Rolecards
> # [color=green]Town[/color] > > **You are a member of the Town! You are in [Group A/Group B].** > > *Eliminate both members of the Mafia, while at least one member of the Town is still alive.*
> # [color=red]Mafia[/color] > > **You are a member of the Mafia! You are in [Group A/Group B].** > > *Reach equal numbers with the Town.*
# Classlist
[color=green]**Town (Group A)** **Town (Group A)** **Town (Group B)** **Town (Group B)**[/color] [color=red]**Mafia (Group A)** **Mafia (Group B)**[/color]
# Ins
1. DatBird 2. Arete 3. Surge 4. GGhana 5. an_gorta_pratai 6. SirDerpsAlot
# Backups
1. clonedcheese 2. PokemonKidRyan 3. Mistyx
# Spectators
1. KyoDaz (uninformed) 2. Marshal (uninformed) 3. astand (informed) 4. Conduit (uninformed) 5. min (informed) 6. TheBlueElixir (uninformed) 7. Appelsiini (uninformed) 8. Trochilidae (uninformed) 9. thepigeonnyc (uninformed) 10. sulit (uninformed butter)
## Threadmarks
# **No alts, alts are cringe**
[quote="katze, post:27, topic:84528, full:true"] ## Since this setup is only 6 players, if more than 6 players attempt to sign up in like, the next 24 hours, I may do some wisdom of the modding to give people a fair chance of playing since time zones exist and such :heart:
### [date=2020-10-27 time=01:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [/quote]
[quote="katze, post:42, topic:84528, full:true"] please vote in the poll in this post if you in ty [/quote]

item.title: [FM] Shortnight Signups (6/6)
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
Where we droppin’, boys?

The players:

  1. @DatBird
  2. @Arete
  3. @ChopChop
  4. @GGhana
  5. @an_gorta_pratai
  6. @SirDerpsAlot

May the odds be ever in your favor, or some crap.

katze:

Oh, also, if people don’t post we’re not gonna be scared to replace people out, since this is a very short game

Reminder that there is a requirement of 20 game-related posts per day phase. If we suspect you will not reach this, you will be replaced even if the phase is not yet over - without warning.

Read full topic

item.description:
hello nerds

us gamers (katze and katze 2) will determine the six lucky contestants

this may take some time but should be within the next few hours

if you are not picked and do not wish to be a backup, please dm one of us

game start time will be announced after that probably i guess

Oh, also, if people don’t post we’re not gonna be scared to replace people out, since this is a very short game

Read full topic
